name: SushiSwap Hedged Joint Provider
description: Supplies {{token}} as half of a joint liquidity provider for a Liquidity Pool on [Sushi](https://sushi.com). Rewards are harvested, split between the pairs, sold for more {{token}}, and deposited back into the strategy. Impermanent loss is hedged by buying 7 day [Hegic](https://www.hegic.co) options

en.name: SushiSwap Hedged Joint Provider
en.description: Supplies {{token}} as half of a joint liquidity provider for a Liquidity Pool on [Sushi](https://sushi.com). Rewards are harvested, split between the pairs, sold for more {{token}}, and deposited back into the strategy. Impermanent loss is hedged by buying 7 day [Hegic](https://www.hegic.co) options

fr.name: SushiSwap Hedged Joint Provider
fr.description: Fournit du {{token}} dans l'un des cotés d'une pool (single side LP) sur [Sushi](https://sushi.com). Les récompenses sont récoltées, réparties entre les paires, vendues pour plus de {{token}}, et redéposé dans la stratégie.

es.name: SushiSwap Hedged Joint Provider
es.description: Suministra {{token}} como la mitad de un proveedor de liquidez conjunto para un grupo de liquidez en [Sushi](https://sushi.com). Las recompensas se cosechan, se dividen entre los pares, se venden por más {{token}} y se vuelve a depositar en la estrategia. La pérdida no permanente se cubre comprando opciones de 7 días en [Hegic](https://www.hegic.co)

de.name: SushiSwap Hedged Joint Provider

tr.name: SushiSwap Hedged Joint Provider
tr.description: [Sushi](https://sushi.com) üzerinde bir Likidite Havuzu için ortak bir likidite sağlayıcısının yarısı kadar {{token}} sağlar. Ödüller toplanır, çiftler arasında bölünür, daha fazla {{token}} karşılığında satılır ve stratejiye geri yatırılır. 7 günlük [Hegic](https://www.hegic.co) opsiyonları satın alınarak kalıcı kayıplardan korunma sağlanır.

vi.name: SushiSwap Hedged Joint Provider
vi.description: Supplies {{token}} as half of a joint liquidity provider for a Liquidity Pool on [Sushi](https://sushi.com). Rewards are harvested, split between the pairs, sold for more {{token}}, and deposited back into the strategy. Impermanent loss is hedged by buying 7 day [Hegic](https://www.hegic.co) options

zh.name: SushiSwap Hedged Joint Provider
zh.description: 将 {{token}} 作为一半的流动性放入 [Sushi](https://sushi.com) 收获奖励后会被平分，然后卖掉换为更多的 {{token}}并进行复投。为了对冲无偿损失，此策略在 [Hegic](https://www.hegic.co) 上购买 7 日期权。

hi.name: SushiSwap Hedged Joint Provider
hi.description: [Sushi](https://sushi.com) पर तरलता पूल के लिए संयुक्त तरलता प्रदाता के आधे के रूप में {{token}} आपूर्ति किया जाता है। पुरस्कारों को वसूल किया जाता है, जोड़ियों के बीच विभाजित किया जाता है, अधिक {{token}} में बेचा जाता है, और वापस रणनीति में जमा किया जाता है। ७ दिन [Hegic](https://www.hegic.co) विकल्प खरीदकर अस्थायी नुकसान की हेजिंग की जाती है
